settings.title: People with chronic illnesses feel invisible.
settings.subtitle: Buoyâ€™s first campaign spotlights four creators upending chronic illness culture on TikTok by helping those fighting silent battles To Be Seen.
settings.text: From friends and family to social media algorithms and healthcare professionals, chronic illnesses chronically go unseen and unheard.

settings.text1: From Eating Disorder Recovery to Lyme Disease and Chemotherapy Dehydration, chronic illnesses can feel like they swallow your identity.
settings.text2: Join Paula Sojo, Renee Welch, Dom Snyder and Ash Levi on TikTok in reshaping chronic illness culture. Share your story with #ToBeSeen on TikTok. Weâ€™re listening.

settings.title: How does Buoy fit in?
settings.text:
Hydration supplements are one of the first things healthcare professionals recommend for managing chronic conditions.

We made Buoy because the sports drinks, powders and tablets on the market contain dodgy ingredients that exacerbate health issues and come in form factors that arenâ€™t easily absorbed.

settings.title: Get 35% Off
settings.text: For those with chronic illnesses looking for clean hydration, get Buoyâ€™s lifetime 35% off discount with our Chronic Illness Support Program. Apply for the program in two minutes.

settings.title: Donations to Nonprofits
settings.text: We donate a bottle for every bottle sold on our website to a verified 501(c)3 nonprofit supporting chronic illness communities. If you donâ€™t have an illness, you can still support those who do.

settings.title: Chronic Illness Creators
settings.text: For Summer 22, weâ€™re investing only in creators with chronic conditions. These talented creators are often tokenized, unpaid and under-represented and itâ€™s time they got their bag.

settings.title: Thank you. Iâ€™d love to hear your thoughts.
settings.text:
Creating this campaign is the single most rewarding aspect of founding Buoy. I worked with four creators pushing our culture forward. I watched Stew Caldwell and Apphia Castillo redefine brand storytelling with their creative firm Round Two Agency. And I finally celebrated Buoy and our founding teamâ€™s core value of giving back thatâ€™s been a north start for us since day one.

Iâ€™d love it if you share this campaign with friends, family and coworkers. Every voice counts.
